resource.name: 2010 Fort Collins City Employee Earnings
resource.description:
Annual City employee earnings for calendar-year 2010. Earnings figures are those taxed by Medicare.

This dataset cannot be directly combined with previous- or future- year earnings because it doesn't account for title changes or other job status changes. Further, the data represents paid amounts rather than stated salaries – i.e. if an employee worked March-December of a given year, the data reflects 10 months of compensation for the year.
columns_description: Metadata field for record hash. This field is a SHA-1 hash of all other fields in the record, used for validation of record uniqueness.
Metadata field for a suggested sort order. Sort this column in ascending order to order the dataset the way it was intended from the source system.

resource.name: Fort Collins Shelter Service Data
resource.description:
This dataset shows data on the numbers served by Catholic Charities and Fort Collins Rescue Mission shelters in Fort Collins. It is updated monthly with the previous-month"s data. These data are recorded by the shelters and compiled by the City of Fort Collins.

To note when using this data: the Rescue Mission does not have family rooms or accept children, and Catholic Charities does not report turnaways by gender.
columns_name: Northside Aztlan Community Center # Served Overnight During Public Health Crisis - Men
Catholic Charities # of Nights with Turnaways
Rescue Mission # of Nights with Turnaways - Men
Rescue Mission # of Nights with Turnaways - Women
Rescue Mission Total # of Nights with Turnaways
columns_description: Northside Aztlan is only serving men overnight during the crisis (the Catholic Charities numbers report on women and families served and the Rescue Mission numbers report on women served)

resource.name: Fort Collins OpenData Asset Timeline - Provenance
resource.description: A breakdown of the provenance of all assets on the OpenData Portal on the specified date. Provenance is the source of the asset, either from the City of Fort Collins or the community. These values represent all assets on the platform, including those that aren't available to the public, either due to sensitive or otherwise protected information or because they're undergoing the process of public release. For a current list of publicly-posted Portal assets, go to the Published Asset Inventory.
columns_description: Metadata field for record hash. This field is a SHA-1 hash of all other fields in the record, used for validation of record uniqueness.

resource.name: Fort Collins Council Expenses
resource.description:
This dataset provides records from the General Ledger, which includes individual expense records associated with the City of Fort Collins City Council.

Each year"s data are appended annually within two months of the year end.

To review all City business expenses, please visit https://openbook.fcgov.com
columns_description: 'Subsidiary Code' in the City's accounting system, followed by the Councilmember associated with that code.
'Object Code' in the City's accounting system, followed by the description associated with that code.

resource.name: Daily Fort Collins OpenBook Analytics
resource.description:
Daily data from the Google Analytics tag for OpenBook at OpenBook.fcgov.com. 

Analytics shown are presumed to be non-City-employees, as these data come from computers external to the City network. Each day starting at the first day for which there are data is included, and the URL is either a specific page or "all", specifying that every page in the domain is included. Specific-page URLs are filtered to the main Portal page or data assets, so "all" may capture more pages than specified individually.
columns_description: From Google Analytics API: the total number of single page (or single interaction hit) sessions for the property

From Google Analytics API: total number of hits for the view (profile). This metric sums all hit types, including pageview, custom event, ecommerce, and other types. Because this metric is based on the view (profile), not on the property, it is not the same as the propertys hit volume
From Google Analytics API: the average number of pages viewed during a session, including repeated views of a single page
From Google Analytics API: the average duration (in seconds) of users sessions
From Google Analytics API: the percentage of single-page session (i.e., session in which the person left the property from the first page)
From Google Analytics API: the number of sessions marked as a user's first session. This resets each time period
From Google Analytics API: the percentage of sessions by users who had never visited the property before
From Google Analytics API: the total number of users for the requested time period
Metadata field for record hash. This field is a SHA-1 hash of all other fields in the record, used for validation of record uniqueness.
From Google Analytics API: total duration (in seconds) of users sessions
Inclusive start date for analytics capture
From Google Analytics API: the average time users spent viewing this page or a set of pages
Metadata field for a suggested sort order. Sort this column in ascending order to order the dataset the way it was intended from the source system.
URL of a specific page, or all for all pages in the domain
From Google Analytics API: the total number of sessions
Inclusive end date for analytics capture
From Google Analytics API: the total number of pageviews for the property

From Google Analytics API: time (in seconds) users spent on a particular page, calculated by subtracting the initial view time for a particular page from the initial view time for a subsequent page. This metric does not apply to exit pages of the property

Buildings here are those covered by Building Energy and Water Scoring ordinance.
